messages.subject: Homeschool theater
messages.msgSnippet: On the digest I just received, only about three sentences of a post of mine showed up. I assume that s true for the rest of the digests, but if not, I
messages.messageBody:
On the digest I just received, only about three sentences of a post of mine showed up. I assume that's true for the rest of the digests, but if not, I apologize in advance for re-posting this:

I used todcorresponde with a woman from the Wash., D.C. area names Jean who runs a homeschool theater group there. We were about to exchange tapes of each other's homeschool theater productions when I had big computer problems and lost
her address.

Have any of you heard of such a person? I seem to remember she got into some
disputes with people who thought she was excluding kids who didn't
homeschool--I think she was even mentioned in Newsweek at one time.

Thanks for any tips....

Susan
